docs.lead_paragraph: Buenos Aires (By Cable). JUAN DOMINGO PERON is today, six months after taking office as President of Argentina, revolution izing one of the richest nations of South America--a nation which many of its poople hope will in the next fifty or a hundred years be as strong and powerful as the United States.
